alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 10:52AM CDT until March 30 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River at Fenton. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Arnold. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Steelville. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Arnold. * WHEN...From this evening to late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Meramec Bottom Road between Wells Road and Kerth Road begins flooding near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 27.7 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Meramec River Arnold 24.0 21.3 25.5 27.7 25.6 20.2 16.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
